message.content:
{"id": "116744", "title": "Bug 116744 Dynamic text content type has no effect", 
"description": "", 
"OB": "The dynamic text element's Content Type property does not affect the display of the report.",
"EB": "The report displays the same results regardless of whether I set the dynamic text element's Content Type property to Auto, Plain, or HTML. The expected results are as follows:\n- For Plain, the literal content (tags and all) should be displayed.\n- For Auto, content 1, 2, and 3 should appear properly without HTML or RTF tags.\n- For HTML, content 1 and 2 should appear properly without HTML tags, and content 3 should appear with RTF tags.\nPlease refer to the attached report for more details.", 
"SR": ""}

origin.input_prompt:
Your role is a senior software engineer, you are very good at analyzing and writing bug reports.
It is possible that the bug report may lack sufficient details in the OB, EB, and SR sections.  In such cases, your task is to infer the appropriate details based on the context and supplement the bug report to ensure it contains clear and complete OB/EB/SR statements.  Also, improve the wording of these statements for clarity where possible.
To facilitate this process, please provide your responses in JSON format as follows:
{"id": "", "title": "", "description": "", "OB": "", "EB": "", "SR": ""}
origin.input_content:
<BUG REPORT>
{'id': '116744', 'title': 'Bug 116744Dynamic text content type has no effect', 'description': '', 'OB': 'Bug 116744Dynamic text content type has no effect ', 'EB': "The reportdisplays the same results whether I set the dynamic text element's Content Typeproperty to Auto, Plain, or HTML.Expected results:For Plain, I expect the literal content (tags and all) to be displayed.For Auto, I expect content 1, 2 and 3 to appear properly without HTML or RTFtags.For HTML, I expect content 1 and 2 to appear properly without HTML tags, andcontent 3 to appear literally with RTF tags.See attached report. ", 'SR': ''}
